qas.question: What has influenced the design since the beginning of architectural history?
In which direction were the buildings built by the Greeks and Chinese facing?

context: <a0_0>Sunlight<a0_0/> has influenced building design since the beginning of architectural history. Advanced solar architecture and urban planning methods were first employed by the <a1_0>Greeks and Chinese<a1_0/>, who oriented their buildings <a2_0>toward the south<a2_0/> to provide light and warmth.
